TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AzureMachineLearningSkill extends Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.SearchIndexerSkill

Docs.summary: The AML skill allows you to extend AI enrichment with a custom Azure Machine Learning (AML) model. Once an AML model is trained and deployed, an AML skill integrates it into AI enrichment.

MemberSignature.Value: public AzureMachineLearningSkill (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.InputFieldMappingEntry> inputs, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.OutputFieldMappingEntry> outputs, Azure.Core.ResourceIdentifier resourceId, Azure.Core.AzureLocation? location = default);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.InputFieldMappingEntry> inputs, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.OutputFieldMappingEntry> outputs, class Azure.Core.ResourceIdentifier resourceId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype Azure.Core.AzureLocation> location) cil managed

Public Sub New (inputs As IEnumerable(Of InputFieldMappingEntry), outputs As IEnumerable(Of OutputFieldMappingEntry), resourceId As ResourceIdentifier, Optional location As Nullable(Of AzureLocation) = Nothing)

Docs.param: Inputs of the skills could be a column in the source data set, or the output of an upstream skill.
The output of a skill is either a field in a search index, or a value that can be consumed as an input by another skill.

The Azure Resource Manager resource Id of the AML service. It should be in the format subscriptions/{guid}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces/{workspace-name}/services/{service_name}.
The region the AML service is deployed in.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public AzureMachineLearningSkill (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.InputFieldMappingEntry> inputs, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.OutputFieldMappingEntry> outputs, Uri scoringUri, string authenticationKey = default);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.InputFieldMappingEntry> inputs, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Search.Documents.Indexes.Models.OutputFieldMappingEntry> outputs, class System.Uri scoringUri, string authenticationKey) cil managed
Public Sub New (inputs As IEnumerable(Of InputFieldMappingEntry), outputs As IEnumerable(Of OutputFieldMappingEntry), scoringUri As Uri, Optional authenticationKey As String = Nothing)

Docs.param: Inputs of the skills could be a column in the source data set, or the output of an upstream skill.
The output of a skill is either a field in a search index, or a value that can be consumed as an input by another skill.
The key for the AML service.
The scoring URI of the AML service to which the JSON payload will be sent. Only the https URI scheme is allowed.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationKey As String

Docs.summary: The key for the Azure Machine Learning service. This is required for key-based authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property DegreeOfParallelism As Nullable(Of Integer)
member this.DegreeOfParallelism : Nullable<int> with get, set

Docs.summary: (Optional) When specified, indicates the number of calls the indexer will make in parallel to the endpoint you have provided. You can decrease this value if your endpoint is failing under too high of a request load, or raise it if your endpoint is able to accept more requests and you would like an increase in the performance of the indexer. If not set, a default value of 5 is used. The degreeOfParallelism can be set to a maximum of 10 and a minimum of 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As Nullable(Of AzureLocation)

Docs.summary: The region the Azure Machine Learning service is deployed in. This is optional for token-based authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceId As ResourceIdentifier

Docs.summary:
The Azure Resource Manager resource ID of the Azure Machine Learning service. This is required for token-based authentication.
It should be in the format "subscriptions/{guid}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/workspaces/{workspace-name}/services/{service_name}".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScoringUri As Uri

Docs.summary:
The scoring URI of the Azure Machine Learning service to which the JSON payload will be sent. This is required when using no authentication or key-based authentication.
Only the https URI scheme is allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Timeout As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
member this.Timeout : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

Docs.summary: (Optional) When specified, indicates the timeout for the http client making the API call.
